text: Si bibi ku muntu utabona, uwamugaye, umurwayi cyangwa mwe ubwanyu kuba mwarya mu ngo zanyu, mu ngo za ba so, mu ngo za ba nyoko, mu ngo z’abavandimwe banyu, mu ngo za bashiki banyu, mu ngo za ba so wanyu, mu ngo za ba nyoko wanyu, mu ngo za ba nyokorome, mu ngo za ba nyogosenge, mu ngo (z’abo) mufitiye imfunguzo (mwarindishijwe) cyangwa mu ngo z’inshuti zanyu. Ndetse si n’ikosa kuri mwe kuba mwasangirira hamwe cyangwa se mukarya intatane. Ariko igihe mwinjiye mu mazu (atuwe ndetse n’adatuwe), mujye musuhuzanya mu ndamutso nziza ituruka kwa Allah kandi yuje imigisha. Uko ni ko Allah abasobanurira amagambo ye, kugira ngo musobanukirwe
